name: Hackathon.SkillsInterestForm
description: Creates a page with HR Form (Part 2 -Skills and interests)
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

Template.Text: {{"consent" | localize}} {{"degreesCompleted" | localize}} {{"phoneNumber" | localize}} {{"gcJobInterest" | localize}} {{"jobType" | localize}} {{"coop" | localize}} {{"fswep" | localize}} {{"location" | localize}} {{"citizenship" | localize}} {{"citizenshipStatus" | localize}} {{"language" | localize}} {{"fieldsOfInterest" | localize}} {{"fieldsOfExpertise" | localize}} {{"programmingLanguages" | localize}} {{"sql" | localize}} {{"sas" | localize}} {{"r" | localize}} {{"python" | localize}} {{"java" | localize}} {{"perl" | localize}} {{"scala" | localize}} {{"julia" | localize}} {{"matlab" | localize}} {{"stata" | localize}} {{"powerBi" | localize}} {{"qgis" | localize}} {{"arcgis" | localize}} {{"grass" | localize}} {{"cPlusPlus" | localize}} {{"cSharp" | localize}} {{"javascript" | localize}} {{"html" | localize}} {{"css" | localize}} {{"other" | localize}} {{"publicProfilesLink" | localize}} {{"gitHubLink" | localize}} {{"experience" | localize}} {{"cv" | localize}} {% raw %}{{ form.successMessage }}{% endraw %} {% raw %}{{ form.serverValidationMessage[0] }}{% endraw %} [locale en]Register[/locale][locale fr]S'enregistrer[/locale]

DisabledHtml.Html: The contact form is currently disabled.

LocalizedItems.Value: Do you agree to share the information in this form to hiring managers of partnering departments?
Have you completed any degrees or diplomas from a Canadian institution?

Are you interested in a career in the public service? If you select "Yes", your personal information will be shared with potential hiring managers within Statistics Canada and partnering federal departments.
Would you be available for a part-time and/or a full-time position?
Are you currently enrolled in a Co-op program?
Have you ever been employed through FWSEP?
In which province are your currently living?

If not a Canadian citizen, provide your status: Permanent resident, work permit, student Visa, etc. Note: if you have a student Visa, it MUST allow you to work within Canada, proof of allowance and conditions of work will be required.
Are you bilingual (French, English)? Do you have a second language evaluation (SLE) score?

In order to ensure the best possible experience with the Government of Canada, knowing your field of interest will help us identify a potential opportunity for you. Please check off all the fields of expertise of interest to you:
Web development with expertise in accessibility (WCAG)

Please rate on a scale to 0 (no experience) to 5 (fully proficient) all the programming languages you have experience with whether it was through class studies, an academic project or work experience.
Please check off all the fields of expertise you have applied through an academic project or work experience.
Please provide us with a link to a professional public profile (e.g. LinkedIn, GCCollab).
Please provide us with a link to your GitHub account.

In approximately 200 words, please provide a brief description of one or two projects you may have worked in as part of your school work, as part of a job, or elsewhere that demonstrates your knowledge and usage of the software's and methods outlined above. To help you with the structure of this answer, please ensure to:

Describe the problem you had to solve. Specify the data set(s) you used. Specify the programming language or any other applications you had to use. Describe the strategies and techniques you employed. Provide the results of the project.

Please upload your curriculum vitae (CV)/resume.
Disclaimer: if you choose to upload your CV, your personal information and experience will be shared with potential hiring managers within Statistics Canada and partnering federal departments.
Please specify if you have completed any degrees or diplomas from a Canadian institution.
Please specify whether or not you have an interest in a career in the public service.
Please indicate whether you are available for a part-time or full-time position.
Please indicate whether or not you are enrolled in a Co-op program.
Please indicate whether or not you have ever been employed through FSWEP.
Please indicate which province you are currently living in.
Please indicate whether or not you are a Canadian citizen.
Please indicate whether or not you are bilingual and have a second language evaluation score.
You have not entered a rating for one or more of the programming languages. Please try again.
Please provide a brief description of one or two projects you have worked on in the past.
Please rate your experience with the programming language you entered.
